name: A* workshop
tagline: Code for A* algorithm workshop for SIG-Games
body:
#SIG-Games Workshop

##Main Topic: A* Pathfinder Algorithm 
###Sub Topics: None
 
Purpose: The main goal of this workshop is to introduce pathfinding algorithms. Mainly, we introduce the A* pathfinding algorithm. We go over the theory behind this algorithm as well as the implementaiton and application in an RTS like setting. 

**Author:** Frank E. Hernandez

**A.K.A.:** CodeMinion

**Site:** [Implementation Video](https://vimeo.com/33883850)
